channel.title: My Garage - Tag - Yuri's Car Factory
channel.description: My Garage - Tag - Yuri's Car Factory

item.title: My garage, #2 - return of the Unimog
item.author: orangetrialtruck.nl
item.description: This week my garage on the shelf looks like this: Toyota Hilux, Land Rover Defender and … the orange gentleman is back! I completed the modification of the Unimog and am happy with the result (well, at least for now). I hope I will find time soon and take cool pictures and maybe a video. 42082 MOD I have started to modify the 42082 (Rough Terrain Crane). The plans are to make it fully RC.

item.title: My garage, #1
item.author: orangetrialtruck.nl
item.description: This week my garage on the shelf looks like this: Toyota Hilux, Land Rover Defender and disassembled Unimog. The 42082 (Rough Terrain Crane) is on the top shelf - it is going to be rebuilt soon into a full RC MOD.
